    Dynamic R Markdown Blocks with heddlr

    Source: vignettes/control-flow-with-heddlr.Rmd
    control-flow-with-heddlr.Rmd

    One of the interesting side effects from decomposing your R Markdown documents into separate patterns is how much easier it is to dynamically include or drop entire sections from your reports. This vignette quickly looks at a few ways heddlr helps you do this, as well as methods provided by R Markdown itself.

    Note that this vignette uses some functionality from the current development version of heddlr – in order to use NA with heddle, try installing the development version from GitHub with devtools::install_github(mikemahoney218/heddlr).

    Including and Excluding Components

    library(heddlr)
    x <- sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), 1)
if (x) {
  print("x was true!")
} else {
  print("x was not true.")
}
#> [1] "x was not true."
